root: ^DAY 30 LOG - A Bigfin Squid. These alien-like anomalies are rarely seen by human eyes - in fact, I might be the first. Not that I'm happy about it - its long tendrils extends countless human body lengths, its featureless, gelatinous head looks so foreign it sends a shiver down my spine.

^But what really bothers me isn't this squid - no, this dread has been eating away at me for some time now - this feeling like I'm being watched. Whatever is lurking in these depths, it certainly isn't my friend.
^And worst of all, it seems that its found me first.
